title: GE 290 Plank Chair Charcoal Grey/Ash Wood
body:
Inspired by Hans Wegner in 1953, the Plank Chair became the staple home couch in the 1950’s for families to enjoy their favourite TV soaps together. Like the original, our Plank chair style embraces clean and smooth lines at every angle, rounded edged cushions and an overall slim design which makes it versatile to suit any styled home.
__
